data.text: @angie_rasmussen @forsyth_barb @MaintenancePod has a great episode on Dr. Oz’s evolution from obscurity to grifter-dom
@angie_rasmussen I know this isn’t the point, but using all caps makes me really uneasy. Is there a vaccine for that?
@mikechenwriter Unfortunately you can't report for misleading health information in Canada! But I did report for racism and targeting a group.
@angie_rasmussen I reported the tweet. The cool thing is that you can report it for misleading health, racism, or targeting a group!
@angie_rasmussen And Spain and France gave us syphillis. Cmon oz.  Knock off the racism. Microbes don’t have passports or papers
@angie_rasmussen From blueberries to racism oz is your man
@angie_rasmussen What a complete and utter piece of shit. Ugh.
@angie_rasmussen Not sure I'd want to copyright this but ok...
@angie_rasmussen Steve Quay's been having a totally normal one too... https://t.co/Y3NDZw7UoM
